channel.title: Comments on: My Bloody Valentine for Coachella next year?

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: Last night, my husband let out this big yell. I thought something was wrong, but nooooo, it was just him getting the news about MBV's possible reunion. Hubby is already planning the trip to California...
item.content:encoded:
Last night, my husband let out this big yell. I thought something was wrong, but nooooo, it was just him getting the news about MBV’s possible reunion.
Hubby is already planning the trip to California…

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: I'll believe it when I sees it, and if in fact I do sees it, I'll be on the first plane out to Cali. Do they make an SPF for pasty Irish kids going to the desert?
item.content:encoded: I’ll believe it when I sees it, and if in fact I do sees it, I’ll be on the first plane out to Cali. Do they make an SPF for pasty Irish kids going to the desert?
